summary: The 'Strengthening Artificial intelligence Normalization and Diffusion By Oversight and eXperimentation Act' (SANDBOX Act) proposes establishing a Federal regulatory sandbox program for artificial intelligence (AI). This program, overseen by the Director of the Office of Science and Technology Policy, would allow qualified applicants to temporarily waive or modify certain federal regulations to test and experiment with AI products, services, and development methods. The bill outlines the application process, agency review, and requirements for consumer protection and reporting. It also includes provisions for congressional review of covered provisions and a sunset clause after 12 years.
